我幫英文FB台翻譯左篇野，有需要攞去用：

" From the night of July 7, 2019 to the early morning of July 8, the Hong Kong police has lost control. A large number of police officers were suspected of deliberately breaking a series of police general rules and were completely unregulated in their action. The police continued to deliberately expel journalists, ban filiming, and phsically attack journalists and council members. Within a few hours, a lot of Hong Kong police's rude language and unfounded physical violence were filmed and broadcasted live. Public opinion began to see that Hong Kong has become "police state" during those few hours. In the face of this extreme emergency, the Hong Kong Police and the Hong Kong Government must respond immediately. Hundreds of thousands of people have seen the following police-like triad activities on the spot and through live media broadcasts.
1. The protesters did not attack the police line throughout the night and marched peacefully on Nathan Road. There were even many protesters on the road, along with the general public who did not participate in the rally. On the one hand, the police falsely claimed that the masses had illegally assembled, called on the citizens to leave, and arbitrarily blocked the streets without an apparent logic. On the other hand, when the masses did leave, the police left their front line and started to surround them and took the initiative to attack them with batons, so that they could not leave. The police continued to actively attack the public throughout the night, and the protests was not wearing any protection gear.
2. The citizens who could not leave were peaceful did not resist order, but they were pushed to the ground by the police and arrested after being beaten. The people who passed by were also restrained and were jumped by more than a dozen police officers for no reason. A female passerby just stood on the side with a bottle of water, but was tackled by dozens of policemen and pressed to the ground for no reason.
3. The police rushed into a fast-food restaurant which was in operation to chase and arrest the public. At the same time, the blockade refused to allow reporters to film, deliberately preventing all reporters from witnessing the arrest. The same situation appeared everywhere, and the police repeatedly refused to allow reporters to enter the scene of the arrest.
4. A large number of people who did not participate in the rally, but were just shopping in MK, were swept by batons, yellowed at by police, and were hit with long shields.
5. A large number of police officers wearing helmets and riot gears at the scene did not have a warrant card. When asked in time, some police officers shouted that "the police does not need to display a warrant card for the execution of the duties."
6. When the public confronted the police officers on their violent behaviors, some police officers yelled back laden with cursed words and said "remember my face" and "let's fight 1 on 1."
7. Some police officers refused to let the public leave and said, " You have been toying with me all night."
8. Police-issued uniforms should have a yellow or white paper tag with policeman's number in black displayed, but some police officers intentionally flipped the paper to the blank side to hid the number.
9. After the arrested protesters were taken to the police car, the police car immediately turned off the lights inside the car. Some arrested protesters were taken to private cars as well with the curtain drawn. The police deliberately prevented reporters and the public from seeing how the arrested person was treated inside the car
